result.arabic_text: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هَلۡ نَدُلُّكُمۡ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٖ يُنَبِّئُكُمۡ إِذَا مُزِّقۡتُمۡ كُلَّ مُمَزَّقٍ إِنَّكُمۡ لَفِي خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٍ
result.translation: Kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta suka ce: "Shin zã mu nũna muku wani namiji wanda yake gaya muku wai idan an tsattsãge ku, kõwace irin tsattsãgẽwa, lalle kũ, tabbas, kunã a cikin wata halitta sãbuwa.?"
